name: Godog Fight
description:
This is a short demo version of my up and coming flying game made with the Godot game engine.

You can help support this project by simply watching my videos on YouTube, I would not get any money but it keeps me motivated :-)

Most of my projects are on my GitHub page so if you are looking for just implementation details you will probably find it there.

Update 20/08:

Added the F-86 Sabre andthe F-117a Nighthawk to the game.

The sabre can only use the main gun, the nighthawk have both a main gun and bombs.
